summary: AN ORDINANCE changing the manner of licensing of trade shows and certain street fairs, imposing duties upon the organizer, replacing individual minimum business fees for each participant with a variable fee for the entire trade show, providing for a civil penalty, and amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 6.20.010 and 5.44.130, and adding new sections 6.20.020, -.030, -.040, -.050, -.060, -.070, and -.100 in connection therewith.
